Performance improvements for device list caching

- RoomListHolder service is now solely responsible for caching the RoomDeviceList. This allows to skip loading the from file after the list has been updated.
- Using buffered input and output to write the cache file (about 50% improvement on store and load operations)

Performance improvment - avoid expensive annotations

Caching of annotations contents to prevent expensive calls to annotation in view rendering
